uuta gihin dunna...uu ahapi mewa kohenda fesh badu tikak ne kiyala..ූuu eewata waha watila...man kiwwa api ara niwaduwk gathakaranna hikkaduwe giya welawaka allapu hotale suddiyo nana pinthura wagayak kiyala..kiyanna ahaka ape gedara eha paththeyi kiyala ...mu awith padinchi weyi oowa balanna..passe man makala damma..anika ොdi lamayi dennek ne..podi unata ithin hondata..thiyenawa...pirisama maha sadden sinaseyi....man ithin mage yuthukama kala...dan penne na un heluwen piyambauwoth aැra ape gedarata....me kiyawana oba ho obe danna kiyana niwasaka wadunu gahanu lamun ho wadunu gahuna aya andum aduwen waththe pitiye niwase eliye wada karanawa sellan karanawa wiya haka..ketharam loku uwath owun obata surathal diyaniyan saha wagakim sahitha gahanu wiya haka...namuth anek nodanna lokayata owunge oya adaniruwath pinthuraya wadagath wanne gon baduwakage thaman ganna lada wishishta jayarupayak lesayi...boho wita niweswalin pita andum haya hathak lagena sitina warthamana kanthawan niwesata pamini wita sahallu wimata sahallu andumak anda sitiyaya kiya nasthiwena sadacharayak sanskruthiyak natha..namuth pita ayaku niwasata wadda ganmata pera saha pita ayata pena thanaka sellam karana wadakarana wita salakilimath wima thama sharira saukhyayatath pawule anek ayage saukhyayatath manaya..ketharam danna kiyana kenek uwath niwesata paminenawita ohu samaga ayatha ganudenuwak ho ewan adahasak wath nathinam galapena andumakin sarasi sitima manaya..manda ohuge asata asuwana kanthawage ada niruwatha ho winiwida pena anduma ohu ge sithe ee kanthawa kerehi athi garukatayuuthu bawa saha wishwasaya binda watimata hethu wana bawini..ma kalak wiwahaka mithurakuge niwaseka padam wada kipayak karaganma sandaha sathiyakata warak dekak sahabhagi wunemi...ewita dinak ohu alu kamarawak gena awith thibuni.ewita rathri sahallu andumakin siti ohuge birindage pinthura kipayak ohu wisin ganna ladi..pasukaleka ohuge parighanakaya soyabalu mata ee pinthura yalith wathawak dakagannata hakiwiya...tharamak mahatha sharira athi aැෙg birindage mana rupayen aawaranaya wiya yuthu wisal kotas age winiwida penena rathri anduma winiwida gos satahan wi thibuni.mage mithurage birinda mageda honda yahaluweku wunisa mata ehi etharam ma loku pudumayak nowuye ewan andumwalinma aya nithara dewele ma daka thibu nisaya..ewele ma wisin eya kopi karagatha hakiwa thibunath ma wisin ee awasthawedima ohuta dan ee pinthura tika maka damuwemi...mewan pariganaka jangama durakathana saha ayi padi wani tablat wargaye ayithama dosha sahitha wuwita eewa sadimata dimedith..nathnma sulu welawak sandaha wenath ayeku pawichchiyata ganna witadith mewan pinthura saha widiyo wala athi de sulu idak haraha janapriya nawathama niruwath chayarupayak lesa ho widiyowak mulu antharjalayatama ekathu wiya haka...mewan witaka antharjalayata obe niruwatha ek miniththuwak wiwrutha wi thibunoth eya yalith maka damima yanu ithama apasu karyayaki...ketharam hithawath wuwath thamage pudgalika dewal pudgalika lesa thibimata awasinam eewaey pinthura ganmata ida nodima wadagath weyi...me api jiwathwena aasiyathika samajaye menma yuerapiya ratawala pawa niruwath chayarupa widiyo wala sitina gahanun siyalla balana aya sithanne mudalata anga dandena gahanunge sellam wiya haki bawayi...waradilawath oba gahaniyaka nam obage rupayak mese niruwath lesa antharjalaye thibi yam dinaka oba yam sammukha parikshanayakata yana wita ehi sitina kenek me pinthuraya daka thibunoth athwena ho athwiya haki garuthwaya gana ma atuwa tika tiffani kimata awasi nathayi sithami..gahanun niruwath chayarupa widiyo narambaimata etharamma nambauruwak hambaayamak nathi uwath danata ma daka athi boho sil karuwna lesa asapu wala padinchi wi sitina athi bhakthimath pinwath upasaka mahathwaru pawa sil pawaranaya kara rathri nindata yamata pera mewan de jangama durakathanayena narambaa sadaha sithin sathapenu ma dan me monitaraya desa bala sitina as gedi dekenma daka thibe....ma dinak ape bodime sita dumriya nawathumata ena athara apuru siddhiyak ditimi...gahaniyek geyi mulika doratuwa athi thana sitagena thuwayakin siya siyalu lajjawan wasagena ek athakin pinganada anik athin bathda gena sitagenama bath kayi...api nikamata sithamu parata hayi ga wiwruthawa thibu gettu thappa rahitha ema niwase podi ekek sita waradilawath ara thuwayen addanam ho ්waradimakin thuwaya bural wi watunanam.?ayage eka athaka bath malupiniya..anik athe pinganaya...mewn andumak andagenath samaharu wiwrutha sthanawala redi wanimawani katayuthu wala yedenu ma daka atha..thuwaye barata eya wishala wastharayak lesa ganu ayata sithenawa wennata puluwana..namuth bima athi baldiyen redi ganmata namena wita..samara wita pitupasin sitina pirimi kenekuta as wasagannata amathaka unoth sori dot komya..ee siduwima ee welawata ee ayurinma wenu allapu gedara inna wanachara kolla ho kolu thaththa kenek kamarawak allagena sitiyoth ane ara kamarawa lajjawen ambaaremi්na katha dasuna rupagatha karagannawa atha..kamarawa pasupasa sitina kena siya kerumkara kama penwimata ara allapu gedara kunu sariraye kunu bahula sthana chayarupaye satahan wi athi andama siya yahaluwanta penwanuda
